member.name: M:ConsoleApplication1.Screens.ScreenManager.Activity
member.summary: Calls activity on the current screen and checks to see if screen activity is finished. If activity is finished, the current Screen's NextScreen is loaded.

member.name: M:ConsoleApplication1.Screens.ScreenManager.Start(System.String)
member.summary: Loads a screen. Should only be called once during initialization.
member.param: Qualified name of the class to load.

member.name: M:ConsoleApplication1.Screens.ScreenManager.OnStateDeactivating
member.summary: Do all state deactivation work here.

member.name: M:ConsoleApplication1.Screens.ScreenManager.OnStateActivating
member.summary: Do all state activation work here

member.name: P:ConsoleApplication1.Screens.Screen.IsActivityFinished
member.summary: Gets and sets whether the activity is finished for a particular screen.
member.remarks: If activity is finished, then the ScreenManager or parent screen (if the screen is a popup) knows to destroy the screen and loads the NextScreen class.

member.name: P:ConsoleApplication1.Screens.Screen.NextScreen
member.summary: The fully qualified path of the Screen-inheriting class that this screen is to link to.
member.remarks: This property is read by the ScreenManager when IsActivityFinished is set to true. Therefore, this must always be set to some value before or in the same frame as when IsActivityFinished is set to true.

member.name: M:ConsoleApplication1.Screens.Screen.MoveToState(System.Int32)
member.param: This should be a valid enum value of the concrete screen type.

member.name: M:ConsoleApplication1.Screens.Screen.HandleBackNavigation
member.summary: Default implementation tells the screen manager to finish this screen's activity and navigate to the previous screen on the backstack.
member.remarks: Override this method if you want to have custom behavior when the back button is pressed.

member.name: P:ConsoleApplication1.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:ConsoleApplication1.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:ConsoleApplication1.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.
